member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ReportNameFormat
member.summary: Sets the format string to use to generate the reports filenames. Any occurence of {0} will be replaced by the date, and any occurrence of {1} by the time. The default format string is test-report-{0}-{1}.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ReportDirectory
member.summary: Sets the name of the directory where the reports will be put. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist. Existing files will be overwritten. The default report directory is "Reports".

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.RuntimeVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the .Net runtime to use for running tests. For the CLR, this must be the name of one of the framework directories in %SystemRoot%\Microsoft.Net\Framework. eg. 'v2.0.50727'. The default is null which uses the most recent installed and supported framework.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.Debug
member.summary: Attaches the debugger to the test process when set to true.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ShadowCopy
member.summary: Shadow copying allows the original assemblies to be modified while the tests are running. However, shadow copying may occasionally cause some tests to fail if they depend on their original location.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative or absolute path of the working directory or null to use a default value selected by the consumer.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ApplicationBaseDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative or absolute path of the application base directory, or null to use a default value selected by the consumer.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.PluginDirectories
member.summary: Additional Gallio plugin directories to search recursively.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.HintDirectories
member.summary: The list of directories used for loading referenced assemblies and other dependent resources.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.RunnerExtensions
member.summary: Specifies the type, assembly, and parameters of custom test runner extensions to use during the test run. The value must be in the form '[Namespace.]Type,Assembly[;Parameters]'

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.RunnerType
member.summary: The types supported "out of the box" are: Local, IsolatedAppDomain and IsolatedProcess (default), but more types could be available as plugins.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.TestRunnerOptions
member.summary: Specifies option property key/value pairs for the test runner.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ReportFormatterOptions
member.summary: Specifies option property key/value pairs for the report formatter

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.ShowReports
member.summary: Sets whether to show generated reports in a window using the default system application registered to the report file type.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.RunTimeLimit
member.summary: Sets the maximum amount of time (in seconds) the tests can run before they are canceled.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.IgnoreAnnotations
member.summary: Sets whether to ignore annotations when determining the result code.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.EchoResults
member.summary: Sets whether to echo results to the screen as tests finish.

member.name: F:Fake.Gallio.GallioParams.DoNotRun
member.summary: Sets whether to load the tests but not run them.
